name: It Was Desert
description:
It Was Desert

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

3D Isometric Arcade developed during Ludum Dare 49

Run towards the exit before time expires!
It wont be as easy as it looks since each time the dice moves, the WASD controls change orientation.

Overview

Reach the finish before time expires. The WASD orientation changes following the arrows on the dice, the W leads you to the direction the arrow points at.

Controls

WASD to move the Dice

(arrow keys work too)

Thanks for playing! And don’t hate your WASD too much it is just our fault ;_;

Credits

Andrea Ancona - Game Designer

Andrea Teruzzi - Game Designer / Programmer

Marco Marchitelli - Progammer / Tech Artist
